微软将Windows Server 2025自动升级归咎于第三方工具https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-blames-windows-server-2025-automatic-upgrades-on-third-party-tools/ Mon, 11 Nov 2024 11:36:44 -0500塞尔吉·加特兰Microsofthttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-blames-windows-server-2025-automatic-upgrades-on-third-party-tools/ Microsoft has finally confirmed that some Windows Server 2019 and 2022 systems were "unexpectedly" upgraded to Windows Server 2025 on devices if updates were managed using third-party patch management tools.
